entries.english: G (g): Gũka gũcia guoko gwaakwa (grandfather, pull my hand), Gĩra gĩkombe gĩkĩ (come for this cup). H (h): Haha hena heho (this place is cold), Hũha mwaki wahota (blow the fire if you can), Hoho nĩ ya hoha (the capsicum has shriveled). K (k): Kaĩrĩtu kena karamu (the girl has a pen), Kahĩĩ nĩ karatha kanyoni (the boy has shot the bird), Kana kona kora kora (the child saw a frog and ran away)
entries.kikuyu: Consonant Pronunciation Practice - G, H, K
